name: Invading Space (Paivobot)
description:
Do you like Space Invaders?

Have you ever wanted to play as the Invaders?

Now you can!Bring back that 80s nostalgia with Invading Space, you control a trio of Invaders trying to rule the arcade, but the problem is that the players never stop coming, how many ships can you destroy?

Instructions:

WASD to move

Enter to pause

Click on Invader to shoot

An addicting game, made interely by Victor Hugo Piffer and Paivobot!

This game is opensource an has no interest in money, we just want to make you smile and have fun!
